travel.t[1890]

Carry out the inherited handling

nonTravel (loc, dir)

travel.t[2237]

Function to handle what will probably be non-travel in a direction that doesn’t point to exit. The loc parameter specifies the room we’re attempting travel from. For use as a common routine called by TravelAction, PushTravelDir and UnlistedProxyConnnector. *. Adv3Lite Library Reference Manual
